name: Professor Bubbles
description:
Professor Bubbles is a classical platformer in 1990s style. This very first alpha demo version contains a single playable level, which represents the core gameplay mechanics, extra cute pixel-art graphics and retro style OPL2 synthesized music and sound effects(!). Be aware that the game is in active development and further content will be pushed out on a regular basis. 

Any feedback is absolutely welcome!

Enjoy the game!

-H.Ruotsalainen
